update tb_order

payment = #{record.payment,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
payment_type = #{record.paymentType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update tb_order set order_id = #{record.orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, payment = #{record.payment,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, payment_type = #{record.paymentType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, post_fee = #{record.postFee,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{record.status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{record.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, payment_time = #{record.paymentTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, consign_time = #{record.consignTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_time = #{record.endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, close_time = #{record.closeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, shipping_company_code = #{record.shippingCompanyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shipping_code = #{record.shippingCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_id = #{record.userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, buyer_message = #{record.buyerMessage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, buyer_nick = #{record.buyerNick,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, buyer_rate = #{record.buyerRate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receiver_area_name = #{record.receiverAreaName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receiver_mobile = #{record.receiverMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receiver_zip_code = #{record.receiverZipCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receiver = #{record.receiver,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, expire = #{record.expire,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, invoice_type = #{record.invoiceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, source_type = #{record.sourceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, seller_id = #{record.sellerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, item_num = #{record.itemNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, shipping_type = #{record.shippingType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receiver_province = #{record.receiverProvince,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receiver_city = #{record.receiverCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receiver_area = #{record.receiverArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, express_code = #{record.expressCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update tb_order
payment = #{payment,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
payment_type = #{paymentType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
post_fee = #{postFee,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
payment_time = #{paymentTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
consign_time = #{consignTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

shipping_company_code = #{shippingCompanyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
shipping_code = #{shippingCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

buyer_nick = #{buyerNick,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
buyer_rate = #{buyerRate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

receiver_mobile = #{receiverMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update tb_order set payment = #{payment,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, payment_type = #{paymentType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, post_fee = #{postFee,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, payment_time = #{paymentTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, consign_time = #{consignTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, close_time = #{closeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, shipping_company_code = #{shippingCompanyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shipping_code = #{shippingCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, buyer_message = #{buyerMessage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, buyer_nick = #{buyerNick,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, buyer_rate = #{buyerRate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receiver_area_name = #{receiverAreaName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receiver_mobile = #{receiverMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receiver_zip_code = #{receiverZipCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receiver = #{receiver,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, expire = #{expire,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, invoice_type = #{invoiceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, source_type = #{sourceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, seller_id = #{sellerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, item_num = #{itemNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, shipping_type = #{shippingType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receiver_province = #{receiverProvince,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receiver_city = #{receiverCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receiver_area = #{receiverArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, express_code = #{expressCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT t2.id goodsId, t2.price, t2.goods_name goodsName, t2.small_pic smallPic, t2.reduced_price reducedPrice, ( SELECT t3.`name` FROM tb_brand t3 WHERE t3.id = t2.brand_id ) brandName, t1.goods_id goodsId, ( SELECT t4.`name` FROM tb_item_cat t4 WHERE t4.id = t2.category3_id ) categoryName, ( SELECT t5.`name` FROM tb_seller t5 WHERE t5.seller_id = t2.seller_id ) sellerName, t1.num FROM tb_order_item t1 JOIN tb_goods t2 ON t1.goods_id = t2.id WHERE t1.order_id = #{orderId}

SELECT t1.user_id userId, t1.payment, t1.`status`, t1.item_num itemNum, t1.receiver, t1.receiver_area_name receiverAreaName, t1.receiver_mobile receiverMobile, t1.buyer_message buyerMessage, t1.order_id orderId, t1.create_time createTime, t1.shipping_type shippingType, t1.receiver_province provinceName, t1.receiver_city cityName, t1.receiver_area areaName FROM tb_order t1

SELECT t1.order_id orderId, t1.`status` orderStatus, t1.payment, t1.create_time createTime, t1.payment_time paymentTime, t1.shipping_code shippingCode, t2.nick_name nickName, t3.address receiverAddress, t3.contact receiverName, t3.mobile receiverMobile, ( SELECT t4.`name` FROM tb_seller t4 WHERE t4.seller_id = t1.seller_id ) sellerName FROM tb_order t1 LEFT JOIN tb_user t2 ON t1.user_id = t2.id LEFT JOIN tb_address t3 ON t1.user_id = t3.user_id ORDER BY t1.create_time DESC
